My name is Xiangmin Sun. Sam is my pseudonym to facilitate communication. I am a postdoc on eddy covariance measurement and isotopic ecohydrology at [Arizona State University](https://hydrology.asu.edu/). When not wrangling with data or being innovative in research, Xiangmin (Sam) enjoys playing table tennis and badminton, and reading in history and psychology.
